Like their fellow metallic brethren, steel dragons can use long-range dragonfire in addition to using melee.

Steel dragons are powerful dragons found in the Brimhaven Dungeon and the Catacombs of Kourend. Steel dragons are the fourth strongest metallic dragons, behind mithril, adamant and rune dragons. They have a chance of dropping the draconic visage. Like their fellow metallic brethren, steel dragons can use long-range dragonfire in addition to using melee.

Completion of the Elite Karamja Diary notes the steel bars that they drop.

If they are fought without complete dragonfire protection, it is recommended to stay in melee range and use Protect from Melee, to reduce the amount of dragonfire damage taken.

One Steel dragon is fought during Dragon Slayer II.

Drops[edit | edit source]

The following drop rates are provided by Jagex, unless otherwise specified.

The average Steel dragon kill is worth 9,905.68.

The average Steel dragon kill while on a Konar task is worth 11,545.42.

Steel bar5Always[d 1]2,160300

26 January –
